com.kennyscott.serializingobjectstodatabase
Class Basic

java.lang.Object
  com.kennyscott.serializingobjectstodatabase.Basic

public class Basic
extends java.lang.Object

Simple class showing how to create a bunch of objects, serialize them and stick them in a database, and later retrieve one and make sure we can read the data back out again.

Constructor Summary

          Generates a QueryRunner using the default info held in getDataSource()

private void execute(java.lang.String[] args)
It's probably easier to read the source, but ultimately, this method:
  1. truncates the db table
  2. inserts 4 people
  3. retrieves one of the people from the database
  4. reads some data to make sure it's valid
